JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA FRIDAY, THE 8TH DAY OF DECEMBER 2017/17TH AGRAHAYANA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 7964 of 2017 () CRIME NO. 582/2017 OF SREEKANDAPURAM POLICE STATION , KANNUR PETITIONER/ACCUSED NO.3: JAVID.E.P, S/O. V.P MOIDEEN, AGED 36 YEARS, EDAPPARA PUTHIYAPURAYIL HOUSE, SHANTHI MAHAL, CHEKKIKULAM P.O, MANIYUR AMSOM, KANNUR DISTRICT. BY ADVS.SRI.V.A.SATHEESH SRI.V.T.MADHAVANUNNI RESPONDENT /COMPLAINANT : STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, THROUGH S.H.O SREEKANDAPURAM POLICE STATION, KANNUR DISTRICT BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI C.S.HRITHWICK THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08-12-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: K.V. . ee 2017/KER/49776 Cr1.MC.No. 7964 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE Al TRUE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.582/2017 OF SREEKANDAPURAM POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE A2 TRUE COPY OF THE LICENSE ISSUED TO THE PETITIONER DATED 18-4-2016. ANNEXURE A3 TRUE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE SEIZURE MAHAZAR PREPARED BY THE POLICE IN CRIME NO. 5582/2017 OF SREEKANDAPURAM POLICE STATION. DT 8.9.2017 ANNEXURE A4 TRUE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE SCENE MAHAZAR PREPARED BY THE POLICE IN CRIME NO. 582/2017 OF SREEKANDAPURAM POLICE STATION. DT 9.9.2017. ANNEXURE A5 TRUE COPY OF THE INVOICE ISSUED TO THE PETITIONER DATED 30-1-2017. ANNEXURE AG TRUE COPY OF THE INVOICE ISSUED TO THE PETITIONER DATED 1-2-2017. RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS NIL /TRUE COPY/ K.V. P.S.TO JUDGE Behl 2017/KER/49776 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. ~Crl.M.C.No.7964 of 2017 Dated this the 8" day of December, 2017 ORDER Annexure-Ai FIR in Crime No.582/2017 is under challenge. The crime has been registered for the offences under Sections 4 and 5 of the Explosive Substance Act, 1908. 2. A huge quantity of explosives were seized in this case. According to the petitioner, he had legally procured the said items through Annexures A5 and A6. Annexure-A5 is dated 30.01.2017 by which four boxes of super power 90' and one box of 'safety fuse were purchased by the petitioner. Through Annexure-A6 the same quantity of materials as is contained in Annexure-A5 were purchased by the petitioner, on 01.02.2017. Even though these materials were allegedly purchased on 30" day of January and 1 day of February, the same were allegedly kept there. The seizure was on 08.09.2017. At present, in the absence of any evidence it cannot be believed that the materials were allegedly purchased through Annexures A5 and A6. Allegedly, the materials were not properly kept also. o marl 2 EA ba pie ery ap 2017/KER/49776 Crl.M.C. No.7964 of 2017 = 2: 3. On going through the matters and on hearing either sides, it has come out that presently there is absolutely nothing to interfere in the matter. Let the investigation go on in the matter. With liberty to the petitioner to challenge the final report in case he is aggrieved, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of. Sd/- B. KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE. sd // True Copy // PA. to Judge
